attributes.action: Protect UK pork production by limiting cheap EU pork that does not meat UK cruelty standards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Moves should be taken to reduce the flood of cheap EU pork that does not meet the UK's higher standards of animal welfare. The use of 'sow crates' is illegal in the UK so we should not be condoning the sale of pork that uses this inhumane method of production.
